tooltips.gladiators.hiltless_horror: This powerful blade is just that: a blade! With no hilt, this sword hurts its wielder almost as much as its target!
tooltips.gladiators.gay_ray: Shoot at an enemy to make them gay (Very distracting).
tooltips.gladiators.infinite_pizza: Infinite Pizza! Yummy! Too bad it has pineapples in it...
